page.title: 11A Day at School in Banbury
page.content: I get up in the morning. I have my breakfast. Then I leave for school at 8.30a.m. and get to school at about 8.35a.m. The bell goes at 9a.m. We go to our classroom and start to work. Sometimes we have an assembly. We work until 10.30a.m. and have a break. At 10.45a.m. we go in and work till 12 noon. We have an hour's dinner break. At 12.30 school dinner children come out and "sandwiches" go in. We start work again at 1p.m. and carry on working until 3p.m. Then we go home. Sometimes we have out-of-school activities. We play games like football or cricket at break.
